Description.Text: Grand Hotel Gallia is a modern 4-star superior hotel offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Milano Marittima. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre, a sauna and a good location near the beach. Milano Marittima is a peaceful seaside resort boasting a beautiful coastline and a lush green landscape. Nearby places of interest include the beach, Regional Park of the Po Delta and the House of Butterflies. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Milano Marittima destinations. The hotel is housed in a 20th-century mid-rise building. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre, a sauna and private massage treatment rooms. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior rooms are larger than classic rooms, decorated in a comfortable style with light tones and features a private balcony. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, a mini-bar, a safe and a telephone. The en-suite bathroom features a bathtub with integrated shower. The hotel's restaurant serves local and international cuisine in an elegant setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
